explains: adj. 自由决定的，酌情决定的；代表委托人全权进行投资的
wordGroup: discretionary power [法]自由裁量权；酌处权
discretionary spending 可自由支配的个人开支
discretionary income 可随意支配的收入

sentences.en: Magistrates were given wider discretionary powers.
sentences.cn: 地方法官们被赋予了更广泛的酌情决定权。

sentences.en: You may be eligible for a discretionary grant for your university course.
sentences.cn: 读大学课程可能会有资格获得学校自行决定是否发放的助学金。

sentences.en: Of course, I have discretionary income.
sentences.cn: 当然，我有可自由支配的收入。
